label: Table Linens and Accessories
description: Products and accessories for table decoration and protection.
intents: Protect table from spills and stains

subcategories.label: Tablecloths
subcategories.description: Large pieces of fabric used to cover tables.

subcategories.label: Table Runners
subcategories.description: Long, narrow pieces of fabric used to decorate tables.
nouns: Black and white striped table runner

subcategories.label: Placemats
subcategories.description: Small mats used to protect table surfaces and enhance table decor.

subcategories.label: Napkins
subcategories.description: Cloth or paper used to wipe mouth and hands during meals.

subcategories.label: Kitchen Textiles
subcategories.description: Textiles used in the kitchen for cleaning and handling hot items.
